preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 75.0 g of Arsenic Trioxide and 90.0 g of Calcium Carbonate. 
2. Measure 60.0 g of Cadmium Oxide and 30.0 g of Silicon Dioxide. 
3. In a clean glass container, combine the solid ingredients. 
4. Gradually add 150.0 g of distilled water while stirring continuously to form a slurry. Ensure all solids are well mixed and no lumps remain.
